document_title: What is dog tapeworm infection? Is it dangerous? Causes and symptoms
subsection_content: Whether or not dog tapeworm treatment is effective depends on the level of infection and the affected organs. In mild stages such as new symptoms of diarrhea and abdominal pain, the doctor will prescribe medication and ask you to adjust your lifestyle, avoid contact with cats and dogs, choose clean food and eat hygienically. born. In many cases, dog tapeworms have moved to the brain, causing epilepsy, making treatment more difficult and long-term.
